function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal signage and communication strategies in retail environments could lead to ineffective messaging about COVID-19 precautions and symptoms.","Impact":"Potential for customers to miss important COVID-19 information, leading to a higher risk of transmission within the retail environment.","Mitigation":"Implement standardized, visually appealing signs with clear messaging about COVID-19 precautions and symptoms. Provide training to employees on effective communication of health and safety information.","Technologies":"Digital signage displays with customizable templates, LED message boards for dynamic messaging.","People":"Customers, employees, general public.","Owner":"Retail store management, public health agencies, government authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of standardized signage in small businesses may result in inconsistent communication of COVID-19 information to the public.","Impact":"Inadequate dissemination of crucial COVID-19 information, potentially contributing to confusion and misunderstanding of health and safety measures.","Mitigation":"Provide support and resources to small businesses for creating and displaying standardized COVID-19 signage. Offer training on effective communication of health and safety information.","Technologies":"Digital signage software, templates for COVID-19 signage, printing technology for creating visible and clear signs.","People":"Small business owners, employees, customers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government, business associations."},{"Description":"Limited ability of small businesses to develop visually appealing and effective signage may hamper the communication of COVID-19 precautions and symptoms.","Impact":"Reduced visibility and comprehension of COVID-19 information, leading to potential disregard of necessary health and safety measures.","Mitigation":"Offer design support and resources to small businesses for creating visually appealing and effective signage. Provide guidance on typography, color schemes, and layout for better communication of COVID-19 information.","Technologies":"Graphic design software, printing technology for high-quality sign production, visual communication tools.","People":"Small business owners, employees, customers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government, design professionals."}]}
